title: Infrastructure Discovery and Dependency Mapping
description: Comprehensive assessment of TargetCo's infrastructure footprint within ParentCo environment including server inventory, network dependencies, storage systems, and application hosting models. Map all dependencies to inform separation strategy.

title: Azure AD Tenant Migration Planning
description: Plan migration of 650 TargetCo users from ParentCo Azure AD to BuyerCo Azure AD including identity mapping, application SSO reconfiguration, and access rights transfer. Include testing and rollback procedures.

title: Server Migration to BuyerCo Environment
description: Migrate 110-130 servers from ParentCo infrastructure to BuyerCo Azure environment. Includes VM conversion, network reconfiguration, application testing, and cutover coordination.

title: Device Management Migration
description: Migrate 620 devices from ParentCo Intune to BuyerCo device management, including policy migration, certificate updates, and user communication.

title: SaaS Application Migration and Reconfiguration
description: Reconfigure 45 SaaS applications for BuyerCo identity system, transfer licenses where possible, establish new vendor relationships, and update integrations.

title: Network Discovery and Documentation
description: Comprehensive discovery of TargetCo's current network footprint within ParentCo infrastructure including topology mapping, IP address inventory, VLAN assignments, and circuit documentation

title: WAN Circuit Procurement and Installation
description: Order and install new WAN circuits for all TargetCo locations including internet, MPLS/SD-WAN, and backup connectivity based on business requirements and site criticality

title: IP Address Conflict Analysis and Renumbering Plan
description: Analyze IP address schemes of both TargetCo and BuyerCo environments, identify conflicts, and develop comprehensive renumbering plan with minimal business disruption

title: Day 1 Temporary Connectivity Setup
description: Establish temporary network connectivity solutions to ensure business continuity on Day 1 including VPN tunnels, temporary circuits, and network address translation as needed

title: DNS Migration and Domain Setup
description: Establish new DNS infrastructure for TargetCo, migrate DNS zones from ParentCo, and implement mail routing during transition period

title: Network Security Infrastructure Deployment
description: Deploy firewalls, intrusion prevention systems, and network security controls for TargetCo's independent network infrastructure aligned with BuyerCo security standards

title: Identity Migration from ParentCo to BuyerCo Azure AD
description: Migrate 650 TargetCo users from ParentCo Azure AD tenant to BuyerCo Azure AD tenant, including user accounts, group memberships, MFA settings, and application access permissions. Establish hybrid authentication during transition period.

title: Standalone Security Infrastructure Deployment
description: Deploy independent security tooling stack for TargetCo including EDR (CrowdStrike or equivalent), SIEM solution, vulnerability management, and backup/DR capabilities. Establish security monitoring and incident response procedures.

title: Pre-Close Security Assessment
description: Conduct comprehensive security assessment of TargetCo environment including vulnerability scanning, penetration testing, configuration review, and compliance gap analysis to identify security risks before acquisition close.

title: Compliance Certification Establishment
description: Establish independent SOC 2 Type II and other required compliance certifications for TargetCo operations, including gap remediation, control implementation, and audit preparation.

title: Privileged Access Management (PAM) Implementation
description: Implement PAM solution for 25-40 privileged accounts, including service account management, session recording, and just-in-time access controls to replace ParentCo's privileged access controls.

title: Security Operations Center (SOC) Establishment
description: Establish 24/7 security monitoring capability either through managed security service provider (MSSP) or internal SOC, including threat detection, incident response, and security analytics for TargetCo environment.

title: Integration Program Management Office (PMO) Establishment
description: Establish dedicated PMO to coordinate complex multi-domain integration with critical path dependencies. Includes program manager, technical leads for each domain, vendor management, and executive reporting.

title: Day 1 Readiness and Cutover Planning
description: Comprehensive planning and testing for Day 1 operations including temporary connectivity, emergency procedures, rollback plans, and user communication. Critical for managing business continuity during transition.
